lyrics:
13 contributorsonce in a while lyricsintro
i can see it its funny man
‘cause this life is not going nowhere
and you gon see it
wherever theres struggle knahmean

i see my pain in yo eyes man
so i know you feeling me

that sign of struggle ive seen it in me

verse 1

that people aint satisfied
and youre hating your 9 to 5

but aint no length you go or mountain you climb
not to better your days

i guess youre living better now
share a little of that cheddar now
‘cause i remember days back when
a brother was hustling and robbing too
i done tossed the beretta now
on a whole another level now
still i cant enjoy my fame
unless my people doing the same and get money too
see akon liveget tickets as low as 84you might also likechorus

and see the twinkle in your eyes

struggle no more

ooh yeah
and see the twinkle in your eyes
and i can see that you dont ever wanna cry no more

bounty hunters checking state to state
child support lady on your case

oh what must i do is what youll be asking

dont let satan get ahold of me

but it happened a lot worse to my brother
muhammad i thank god he recovered yeah
